name: Take Care of Bird-chan!
description: "Take Care of Bird-chan!" is a small project i spent about a week making. This game is similar to that of a tamagotchi. The objective is simple... take care of your bird named Bird-chan. This game, although very short, tells a silent story of the sad reality's of life, and quickly changes from that of a fun cheery game where you take care of your pet, to something more solemn.
